channel.title: Jonathan's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Jonathan's Sports Blog

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Jonathan Zettler. I am senior at the University of Nebraska- Lincoln who is majoring in Sports Media and Communications and I will be posting visualizations here that I produce from breaking down the data from sports like football, basketball, and volleyball.

item.title: Did Nebraska Basketball's Defense Improve Throughout the 2021-2022 Season
item.description: It’s no secret that Nebraska had a rough basketball season this year going 10-22 overall and 4-16 in the Big Ten. The team continued to drop games because of poor defense, but did the Cornhuskers defense improve at all throughout the season? Defense clearly was a struggle for the team as many fans pointed out that opposing teams would have their best shooting nights against the Cornhuskers. Did Nebraska’s opponents really shoot that well against them?
